description: This story uses humor derived from the literal interpretation of a computer being 'cold' due to an open 'Windows'.
title: Chilly Tech Troubles
n_1: Sam is puzzled by a computer malfunction in the tech-filled office.
n_2: Lily joins Sam, noticing an error message on the screen.
n_3: A breeze from an open window catches their attention.
n_4: They close the window, fixing the issue, as laughter fills the room.
c1_1: Hmm, why is this computer acting up?
c2_1: Maybe it caught a virus, or is it just freezing?
c2_2: Did you try turning it off and on again?
c1_3: Oh! The computer is cold because the Windows is open!
c2_3: That's one way to catch a draft!
c1_4: Problem solved, no more chilly computers!
c2_4: Next time, let's stick to virtual windows!
